content.prompt: Which of the following does the author of Source 2 most directly cite as evidence of a higher casualty rate among Senegalese soldiers in combat than among French soldiers in combat?

choices.label: The casualty rate as a percentage of all soldiers mobilized for the war
The casualty rate among infantry units
The casualty rate among cavalry, artillery, engineering, and aviation units

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
